Type.Name: DeleteType

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DeleteType extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: This enumeration is used by to see decide how delete behaves.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.DeleteType Chars = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Delete the character that is highlighted by the cursor.

remarks.para: Delete the character that is highlighted by the cursor.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.DeleteType DisplayLineEnds = int32(4)

Docs.summary: Delete from the cursor to the end of the line.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.DeleteType DisplayLines = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Delete lines from the display (i.e., not lines as measured by carriage returns.)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.DeleteType ParagraphEnds = int32(5)

Docs.summary: Delete to the end of the paragraph.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.DeleteType Paragraphs = int32(6)
.field public static literal valuetype Gtk.DeleteType Whitespace = int32(7)

Docs.summary: Delete all the whitespace before the cursor.

remarks.para: Delete all the whitespace before the cursor.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.DeleteType WordEnds = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Delete until the end of a word

remarks.para: Delete only the portion of the word to the left/right of cursor if we're in the middle of a word.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Gtk.DeleteType Words = int32(2)
